div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 248px; height: 1px; padding-top: 7px; margin-left: 2px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.span: ，在你们看起来，这两只筷子是
，可以区分出这两只筷子，我现在需要向你证明我拥有这个
，而不具体告诉你这个知识的内容，当我证明了这件事情，我就完成了零知识证明。

span.data-lark-record-data: {"isCut":false,"rootId":"MNIjdKANZoVb1jx4HwmuzX1askb","parentId":"MNIjdKANZoVb1jx4HwmuzX1askb","blockIds":[42,43,44],"recordIds":["doxus7WgtcPGjfbB1qPIotDWMWg","doxus2cVgp1f0HLmPntL0PYVmS9","doxusudsLMjYx46t2PhahAdme9d"],"recordMap":{"doxus7WgtcPGjfbB1qPIotDWMWg":{"id":"doxus7WgtcPGjfbB1qPIotDWMWg","snapshot":{"type":"heading2","parent_id":"MNIjdKANZoVb1jx4HwmuzX1askb","comments":[],"revisions":[],"locked":false,"hidden":false,"author":"7259192219553251334","children":[],"text":{"initialAttributedTexts":{"text":{"0":"如何在饭桌上一分钟说清楚ZKP"},"attribs":{"0":"*0+f"}},"apool":{"numToAttrib":{"0":["author","7259192219553251334"]},"nextNum":1}},"align":"","folded":false}},"doxus2cVgp1f0HLmPntL0PYVmS9":{"id":"doxus2cVgp1f0HLmPntL0PYVmS9","snapshot":{"type":"bullet","parent_id":"MNIjdKANZoVb1jx4HwmuzX1askb","comments":[],"revisions":[],"locked":false,"hidden":false,"author":"7259192219553251334","children":[],"text":{"apool":{"nextNum":4,"numToAttrib":{"0":["author","7259192219553251334"],"1":["bold","true"],"2":["textHighlight","rgb(143,149,158)"],"3":["underline","true"]}},"initialAttributedTexts":{"attribs":{"0":"*0*1+9*0*2+6*0+4*0*1+4*0+e*0*1+4*0+5*0*1*3+5*0+q*0*1*3+5*0+11"},"text":{"0":"步骤一：问题定义。【面向观众】我手上有两只筷子，在你们看起来，这两只筷子是一模一样的，而我有特殊的知识，可以区分出这两只筷子，我现在需要向你证明我拥有这个特殊的知识，而不具体告诉你这个知识的内容，当我证明了这件事情，我就完成了零知识证明。"}}},"align":"","folded":false}},"doxusudsLMjYx46t2PhahAdme9d":{"id":"doxusudsLMjYx46t2PhahAdme9d","snapshot":{"type":"bullet","parent_id":"MNIjdKANZoVb1jx4HwmuzX1askb","comments":[],"revisions":[],"locked":false,"hidden":false,"author":"7259192219553251334","children":[],"text":{"initialAttributedTexts":{"text":{"0":"步骤二：交互证明。现在开始证明了，【转向其中一位观众，仅示意，不用真给筷子】你可以拿着这两只筷子，放到身后，选择交换或者不交换，然后再拿到前面给我看，由于我有特殊的知识，我可以立即告诉你，是否交换了。如果我回答对了，你会有点相信我真的知道这个特殊的知识，但你依然会怀疑我是猜对的，因此我们可以将这个过程重复多轮，如果我每次都回答对了，你会大概率的相信我真的知道这个特殊的知识，因此这就是零知识证明。"},"attribs":{"0":"*0*1+9*0+8*0*2+l*0+i*0*1+2*0+2*0*1+3*0+g*0*1*3+5*0+a*0*1+4*0+n*0*1*3+5*0+p*0*1+4*0+e*0*1+3*0+r"}},"apool":{"numToAttrib":{"0":["author","725919221 switch.text: 步骤一：问题定义。 【面向观众】我手上有两只筷子，在你们看起来，这两只筷子是一模一样的，而我有特殊的知识，可以区分出这两只筷子，我现在需要向你证明我拥有这个特殊的知识，而不具体告诉你这个知识的内容，当我证明了这件事情，我就完成了零知识证明。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 368px; height: 1px; padding-top: 197px; margin-left: 2px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

li.div:
步骤二：交互证明。
现在开始证明了，
【转向其中一位观众，仅示意，不用真给筷子】
你可以拿着这两只筷子，放到身后，选择
交换
或者
不交换
，然后再拿到前面给我看，由于我有
特殊的知识
，我可以立即告诉你，
是否交换
了。如果我回答对了，你会有点相信我真的知道这个
特殊的知识
，但你依然会怀疑我是猜对的，因此我们可以将这个过程
重复多轮
，如果我每次都回答对了，你会
大概率
的相信我真的知道这个特殊的知识，因此这就是零知识证明。

span.data-lark-record-data: {"isCut":false,"rootId":"MNIjdKANZoVb1jx4HwmuzX1askb","parentId":"MNIjdKANZoVb1jx4HwmuzX1askb","blockIds":[42,43,44],"recordIds":["doxus7WgtcPGjfbB1qPIotDWMWg","doxus2cVgp1f0HLmPntL0PYVmS9","doxusudsLMjYx46t2PhahAdme9d"],"recordMap":{"doxus7WgtcPGjfbB1qPIotDWMWg":{"id":"doxus7WgtcPGjfbB1qPIotDWMWg","snapshot":{"type":"heading2","parent_id":"MNIjdKANZoVb1jx4HwmuzX1askb","comments":[],"revisions":[],"locked":false,"hidden":false,"author":"7259192219553251334","children":[],"text":{"initialAttributedTexts":{"text":{"0":"如何在饭桌上一分钟说清楚ZKP"},"attribs":{"0":"*0+f"}},"apool":{"numToAttrib":{"0":["author","7259192219553251334"]},"nextNum":1}},"align":"","folded":false}},"doxus2cVgp1f0HLmPntL0PYVmS9":{"id":"doxus2cVgp1f0HLmPntL0PYVmS9","snapshot":{"type":"bullet","parent_id":"MNIjdKANZoVb1jx4HwmuzX1askb","comments":[],"revisions":[],"locked":false,"hidden":false,"author":"7259192219553251334","children":[],"text":{"apool":{"nextNum":4,"numToAttrib":{"0":["author","7259192219553251334"],"1":["bold","true"],"2":["textHighlight","rgb(143,149,158)"],"3":["underline","true"]}},"initialAttributedTexts":{"attribs":{"0":"*0*1+9*0*2+6*0+4*0*1+4*0+e*0*1+4*0+5*0*1*3+5*0+q*0*1*3+5*0+11"},"text":{"0":"步骤一：问题定义。【面向观众】我手上有两只筷子，在你们看起来，这两只筷子是一模一样的，而我有特殊的知识，可以区分出这两只筷子，我现在需要向你证明我拥有这个特殊的知识，而不具体告诉你这个知识的内容，当我证明了这件事情，我就完成了零知识证明。"}}},"align":"","folded":false}},"doxusudsLMjYx46t2PhahAdme9d":{"id":"doxusudsLMjYx46t2PhahAdme9d","snapshot":{"type":"bullet","parent_id":"MNIjdKANZoVb1jx4HwmuzX1askb","comments":[],"revisions":[],"locked":false,"hidden":false,"author":"7259192219553251334","children":[],"text":{"initialAttributedTexts":{"text":{"0":"步骤二：交互证明。现在开始证明了，【转向其中一位观众，仅示意，不用真给筷子】你可以拿着这两只筷子，放到身后，选择交换或者不交换，然后再拿到前面给我看，由于我有特殊的知识，我可以立即告诉你，是否交换了。如果我回答对了，你会有点相信我真的知道这个特殊的知识，但你依然会怀疑我是猜对的，因此我们可以将这个过程重复多轮，如果我每次都回答对了，你会大概率的相信我真的知道这个特殊的知识，因此这就是零知识证明。"},"attribs":{"0":"*0*1+9*0+8*0*2+l*0+i*0*1+2*0+2*0*1+3*0+g*0*1*3+5*0+a*0*1+4*0+n*0*1*3+5*0+p*0*1+4*0+e*0*1+3*0+r"}},"apool":{"numToAttrib":{"0":["author","7259192219553251334"],"1":["bold","true"],"2":["textHighlight","rgb(143,149,158)"],"3":["underline","true"]},"nextNum":4}},"align":"","folded":false}},"MNIjdKANZoVb1jx4HwmuzX1askb":{"id":"MNIjdKANZoVb1jx4HwmuzX1askb","snapshot":{"type":"page","parent_id":"","comments":[],"revisions":[],"locked":false,"hidden":false,"author":"7259192219553251334","children":["doxusMMYTgsdhOaEBoP8WZc0i6e","doxusLcJkFXmnmAAXkX9Z8VlvVg","doxuseQs27EnobzAcdmtqQFl5Dd","doxusn7dp2HpoAqwDFQIx8zVLFb","doxusePD4DH6D8uyVbpu0jWAyxZ","doxusFvQXlSDAg9NovOjRJ63p8e","doxuswjpfMuXAqbXhOA59MFu7cc","doxus5tN5lB1vGkJigWmgRSf6LN","doxus56Y83zRU0sBeoYpMzcQqKe","doxusBWc2oJ9dLSL9TOjNGouEbe","doxusekKbGSG3RKgiEip09tWHAb","doxusRREsFNFpE8dcA3me7z4Vad","doxusopN4w9bmkyEZaX8LkhxO1o","doxusvEMJ4IFMmydyOw1hDJCVWg","doxusIo7M46Wteee0t9U4zB10wg","doxusJ3e9q5jRyBa54D0SiBUEjh","doxuscteHfjTvoTYXKbgoI2I5he","doxusv38y93NQtXSxibUjK0XSld","doxusKbsJZb4fa0RvaPWTdOjorg","doxusFOPCMmysl6gYHfpYSMi7Nf","doxus2SxcqELyxBwE8xUwAuwZAX","doxusj1wnZ8RXnI68nHX7OifTMf","doxusHRR5Ev3DQHqYnyLPAOfqqb","doxusChYSN7aLkWXrUpWpoJmuLh","doxus7WgtcPGjfbB1qPIotDWMWg","doxus2cVgp1f0HLmPntL0PYVmS9","doxusudsLMjYx46t2PhahAdme9d","doxusjBT7sIRUuWTWLJCy6X439g","doxusqcpgfkfIfhAalNTSSmT5Gc","doxusVy0cESEUCW4fesvudhjAHh","doxusZnc5bRWG52eTBryIijibyh","doxus02kcI4orrE2p6w2yCiggwh","doxusuxkBRHrejyeEWig9byowXc","doxusjc2wNndcalD3gAITbffDKf","doxushxk59Au1MLedQKVDSEYWbb","doxusrCv1TaIH0o6uYfteWCk0cf","doxusHeTR3DvfJfpBCbr8mvEsQc","doxus3iKddjX7ukDMfrxm8Tmewc","TJIGdQJoToCgJ1xWIxouJyPlsTg","IBbQdbz5goGLwHx0CAcuL5o9s1c","doxusSWNT9frZVlKuF1GlnLzusf","doxus4RGBYYPM1klue8EbTkafsh","doxusGB7MJXt0YX3bktIK3ftOhb","doxuss2DN4rJzSY854tQGjwYMtd","doxusV83wDOl9Nm1KGUUfvs2i5g","doxusqtxc92KueD5e2YkjreAU8f","doxusImWYklhS8h9JqjgINB0tae","doxus6QseIpiMmNwDOnvRDvCfeb","doxusuFr8CRokzWgGKvy8zNGnCc","doxusWZP3k94SDHiI5XuMhw812d","doxusXeG7nDKJA6AFhNFLc8v0Kh","doxustoZU7DtKRIrjBaKxRmbGRf","doxusSzVI6W9biWmaZpRC8kUmqb","doxus3lb7lMl4LxtYoLA6gtO55e","doxusCfivhqRnvqV58a1y9xH6yd" switch.text: 步骤二：交互证明。 现在开始证明了，【转向其中一位观众，仅示意，不用真给筷子】你可以拿着这两只筷子，放到身后，选择交换或者不交换，然后再拿到前面给我看，由于我有特殊的知识，我可以立即告诉你，是否交换了。如果我回答对了，你会有点相信我真的知道这个特殊的知识，但你依然会怀疑我是猜对的，因此我们可以将这个过程重复多轮，如果我每次都回答对了，你会大概率的相信我真的知道这个特殊的知识，因此这就是零知识证明。

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
